numbered_ace_sentences: 2. The red percentage represents players of color.
3. The lighter red percentage represents head coaches of color.
4. I wonder if this is a local issue.
5. I wonder if this is the same problem in all parts of the world.
6. There is a discrepancy between players of color and coaches of color.
7. There are more players of color than head coaches of color.
8. This situation means that there is not much diversity in sports.
9. Some players of color cannot relate to a coach.
10. Some players of color cannot look up to a coach.
11. The headline is: There is no I in teams anymore.
